titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription A Borrower's Card: Miss C. Yarrow

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Tried "biblScope" tag for the "Havelock Ellis" entries to note the volume #'s And used "from" and "to" within date tags to denote "Apr 7th 1934-1935" Cleaned up "Short Novels XVIIIc" to include "v" for "volume #" instead of "L" Changed "Prive" to "Private" on s4 "Diary of Leo Tolstoy" Bottom of s4: Changed "Told of Closing" to "told of closing" and did not classify as a bibl, looks more like a note s5: Changed "1935" to "1938" in subsc renewal info s6: Removed "unclear" tag and replaced with "Journey" in "Superficial Journey"
s2: 5 March P.C. (Crossed out) s6: Mar 9 Superficial s6: July 26 Wuthering Heights Agnes Grey

bibl.title: Reflections on the death of a porcupine
Life as we have Known it

div.note: never returned returned Oct. 29. 1936 will return the book cancel bill and transfer dep. to new card
1 year. 2 vols. 300. Deposit 60 pd. Oct 6. Deposit from last time 50 (pd. 100. will pay rest later) 110

bibl.title: Private Life Diary of Leo Tolstoy

div.note: 27 told of closing M.H.N. will be keeping books out while on holidays. subsc due Sept 14 1937

bibl.title: Sketch for a Portrait of Rimbaud

div.note: Subscription 1 y 1 vol 300v Make keep vol until we telephone her without extra charge Dan. 76-29 Home at Noon Renewed (supposedly) Sept 19. 1938 to Sept 19 1939
Miss Yarrow came on the 3rd brought back Modern Movement in Art
Ask Mrs Yarrow about Miss Carrington Carrington who ordered a book, in Dec. + did not come for it said was Mrs Max Ernst write to rue Jacob
ren. Nov. 22 Ren. 6 m. 2 vol. Nov. 22 1939 to May 22 1940. 180v.
